title: Necromancers Guide to Magic - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Age Progression   Clever Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Dragons   Fanfiction   Genius Protagonist   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Necromancer   Nobles   Ruthless Protagonist   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Vampires   Zombies

description:
This is the story of a Necromancer who was cast into the world of Harry Potter. Taking over the body of a 11 year old first entering into Hogwarts.

“Give me a body, I can pay you a, ah, bone dragon.”>
